job.title: Data Programmer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongstrongCelerion is committed to swift exceptional clinical research through translational medicine strongEvery day we use our experience agility and innovative research strategies to help get drugs to market faster Celerion offers one of the most experienced clinical pharmacology research networks in the industrybrbrAre you looking for an opportunity to support a business creating lifesaving treatments If so we cant wait to meet youbrbrCome be part of our clinical pharmacology team as a strongData ProgrammerstrongbrbrThis fulltime position can be located at either at our Lincoln Nebraska Phoenix AZ or Belfast NIreland clinical trial facilities emRemote work may be considered in certain circumstancesbrbremThe purpose of the Clinical Data Programmer I role is to develop and support clinical database programming activities and associated documentation involved in clinical trial setup conduct and closeout stages in line with protocol requirements standard operating procedures SOPsPGs Good Clinical Programming Practices GXP Clinical Data Interchange Standards CDISC and other applicable sponsor or regulatory requirementsbrbrstronguEssential FunctionsbrustrongulliDeliver and support all SAS programming processes associated with data collection reporting and cleaning for early phase clinical trialsliliDevelop maintain and process SAS programs that create case report forms edit checks data listings and other submission ready database formats to support analysis and reportingliliSupport data import integration and reconciliation programming activitiesliliDeliver and support CDASH and CDISCSDTM or other sponsor specified data transfer packagesliliPerform peer QC functionsliliActively participate in process improvement initiativesliliEnsure that data programming delivers quality outputs on time or better following good programming practices including adequatelydocumented SAS codebrliulJob RequirementsbrbrstrongJob information brbrstrongstronguEducation  Knowledge  SkillsbrustrongulliBachelors degree with 1 yrs programming experience OR comparable experience in related industry previous experience with SAS and clinical data preferredliliSAS experience preferredliliDemonstrated interpersonal skillsliliDemonstrated problem solving and decision making skillsliliDemonstrated ability to manage multiple prioritiesliliDemonstrated communication skillsbrliulInternal Celerion candidates with strong clinical data review data management or IT background will also be consideredbrbrstrongCelerion Values Integrity Trust Teamwork RespectbrbrstrongAre you ready to join our teambrbremCelerion is an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will
